basics.name: Abhisek G. Mahapatra
basics.label: **Automation/DevOps Engineer. Former IBM i Senior Software Developer**
basics.summary:
I am a Senior Software Developer currently working in the role of a Automation / DevOps engineer with more than 6 years of experience in the industry.
I love creating stuff - and working on software development allows me to engage in something that I so much care about.
I beleive in life long learning and and I find it immensely satisfying when I am able to apply my skills towards solving a problem.
During my professional journey so far I have had the oppurtunity to work in various technologies and assumed diverse roles and responsibilities.
I started my career in 2011 after completing my Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Computer Science and started worked as Software Developer on IBM i platform working on a Canadian mutual fund/insurance product primarily involved in developing and delivering software solutions. Later while working as a Senior Software Developer, I was involved in technical solution designing and consulted on a critical functional module of the product, while engaged in other tasks like code deployment, testing support and production troubleshooting.
Next, I worked as a Senior Consultant for a healthcare client based in North Carolina supporting and maintaining production critical applications.
Currently, I am working in an automation/DevOps role that involves creating automated solutions for IBM i admin operations activities as well as setting up IBM i devices for monitoring and support that leverages my skills on scripting and DevOps knowledge as well as my strong background on IBM i platform.

work.summary: I am working as an Automation / DevOps engineer with a strong background on IBM i / AS400 / iSeries platform application programming. My current role is that of an independent developer working closely with the AS400 operations team with responsibilities involving understanding the operations needs and challenges, identifying automation opportunities and implementing solutions contributing to continuous service improvement.
role and responsibilities: Creating monitoring checks and automatons (IPautomata) for IBM i servers.
Deploying monitoring checks for new or existing customers.
Conduct technical sessions and educate team to enable better productivity and efficiency in their day to day tasks.
highlights: Designed and implemented an automation that enhanced the automatic resolution percentage from 60 to 90 % for one of our clients. It takes into account the various complex client rules and parses acts on them accordingly. The abstraction of configuration data from application allowed to accommodate any client rule changes with ease without having to modify the automaton.

Implemented a set of best practises and rules for automation creation for better maintainability and reuse. Also applied naming conventions for automations that facilitates easier search and provides a brief idea about the automation scope and purpose.
Setup CI/CD pipelines for development project using AWS CodeCommit ,  CodeBuild , CodePipeline , CodeDeploy enabling effient build and release cycles.
Used containerization technologies (Docker / Docker Swarm) for scaling up of monitoring units and to provide high availability.
Created a reporting framework that allowed the generation of report in a consistent format and allowing easy conversion between various file formats.

Designed an automaton component for capturing information from email requests and deciding actions based on the contents - this came in good use for cases where batch requests were required to be processed.

Created a catalog of IBM i system reports that allows the client to review the changes to system over a given time period , identify potential troublemakers and provide data points for decision making and fine tuining the system
Took over as the sole offshore developer for a client and contributed in existing development work with minimal guidance and self effort.
Troubleshooting production critical issues and providing prompt and accurate resolution and act as the primary on-call contact.
Research and creating code design based on the requirement, coding, and unit testing and implementing the change to production.
Reviewing the code and design and providing suggestions and feedback.
Train and guide the new recruits, conduct technical sessions, share technical tips and knowledge.
Coordinate with teams from different streams and work closely with them to understand and identify the interdependence for faster identification and resolution of issues.
Implementing the technical design into application code.
Analyzing and understanding the business and functional requirement and modelling the technical design based on it.
Designing test case and performing unit testing and integration testing.
Provide technical support and troubleshooting in client production environment and act as primary pager contact.
Involved during source comparison activities and production release support.
During client onboarding acted as sole Offshore developer for Conversion activities

Worked extensively on SEGFUNDS (segregated funds) a critical module of Unitrax and acted as Offshore Subject Matter Expert  on this module supporting other team members , resolving queries and reviewing code.
Created a tool to validate the existence of required documents compliant with the SDLC lifecycle and generate a consolidated report  with the findings (using Windows Powershell).
Redesigned existing tool to achieve optimization in terms of execution time to generate automated resource work allocation status report (using embedded SQL with VBA ).
Made enhancements to a tool that tracks large object size in local development library.

awards.title: BFS ACE award for Best Individual Performance
awards.summary: Awarded for individual outstanding performance in project  for displaying good analytical skills and technical expertise that contributed to efficient technical design that was well received and appreciated by the clients.

awards.title: BFS Pat on the Back
awards.summary: Awarded for being able to quickly grasp the business functionalities , work independently and active efforts to learn and contribute significantly to the application development team.

awards.title: Emerging Star Award
awards.summary: Awarded for displaying great potential while handling new client account

awards.title: Spot Award
awards.summary: Awarded for technical contribution and training the new recruits

interests.name: Art
interests.summary: Have a great passion for arts, sketching and sculpture

interests.name: Reading
interests.summary: Like to read, mostly non-fiction / self development books and articles
